# MapAnnotationDragEvent

**Class**

An event object that the map object dispatches when someone drags an annotation.

## Declaration

```swift
class MapAnnotationDragEvent extends MapKitEvent
```

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Map] dispatches a [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/MapAnnotationDragEvent] when someone dragging an annotation. The event type can be `drag-start`, `dragging`, or `drag-end`.

## Instance Properties

- **annotation**: The annotation that a person dragged.
- **coordinate**: The coordinate of the annotation while someone is dragging it.

## Map events

- **MapEvent**: An object that represents a gesture the framework recognized on the map.
- **MapAnnotationSelectionEvent**: An event object that the map object dispatches when someone selects or deselects an annotation.
- **MapOverlaySelectionEvent**: An event object that the map view dispatches when someone selects or deselects an overlay.
- **MapUserLocationChangeEvent**: An event that represents a change in a person’s location.
- **MapUserLocationErrorEvent**: An event that indicates that MapKit JS is unable to acquire a person’s location.

## Inherits From

- MapKitEvent
